title: Was Karl Rove ‘Offended’ by Biden’s Inauguration Speech?
subtitle: In his speech, U.S. President Joe Biden denounced racism and white supremacy.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In an interview on Fox News, conservative pundit Karl Rove criticized U.S. President Joe Biden’s inauguration speech, saying, “The racism thing to me is — I was offended in the speech.”
